extendedInfo.description: StarCast for android, featuring content from the StarCast community forums, twitter, and of course the podcast itself!StarCast is a podcast covering everything StarCraft 2. It is hosted by Garrett Weinzierl and Kyle Fergusson. The show has been running since the early days of the StarCraft 2 beta.Strategy discussion for Terran, Protoss, and Zerg. Major tournament coverage (including GSL) witch match recaps and analysis,  Blizzard related news, patch note discussion and much more!

reviews.title: Awesome Show
reviews.comment: Listen to you at work.  Fun and informative show.  Would like to hear more WoL strategy talk for beginning ladder players (bronze and silver).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Playback is rather poor (I stream hq video no prob, wtf this is only voice?) & impossible to get back to where you were,slider is too small. Evo 4g
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worlds great! It\'s the Only way to download episodes from your phone - galaxy s captivate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Freezes all the time. Stream never gets through whole episode without an error.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it that you can dl episodes to prevent streaming issues!

reviews.comment: Great for fans of the show

reviews.comment: I love listening to your show. Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great show
reviews.comment: Avid listener here, got me through many a StarCraft session, keep up the good work guys!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lost their way
reviews.comment: This used to be a wonderful podcast that talked about starcraft 2.  Now the guys only talk to people who play or work with starcraft.  This would be ok but they do not talk about the actual game only about random stuff and events.
reviews.author: A Google User
